sn35.84:4.2: Then Venerable Ānanda went up to the Buddha, bowed, sat down to one side,
sn35.84:5.1: “Sir, they speak of this thing called ‘the world’.
sn35.84:5.3: “Ānanda, that which wears out is called the world in the training of the noble one.
sn35.84:5.5: The eye wears out. Sights … eye consciousness … eye contact wears out. The painful, pleasant, or neutral feeling that arises conditioned by eye contact also wears out.
sn35.84:5.9: The mind … phenomena … mind consciousness … mind contact wears out. The painful, pleasant, or neutral feeling that arises conditioned by mind contact also wears out.
sn35.84:5.10: That which wears out is called the world in the training of the noble one.”
